name: Tab bar buttons as Round Tabs-WinXP - Fx 4+
description: For Firefox 4+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds. This style makes toolbar buttons positioned in the tab bar look like Fx Linux OS rounded tabs on Windows OS. !Important! After applying this userstyle you may have to toggle the Window state from (Minimize to Maximize) or restart the browser, so the style will appear correctly. Works well with Userstyles: style 44825 style 45584 Tested on WinXp with Firefox 4+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds. (Style not tested on Win7/Vista, but may work without problems...) Modified code from user 16328 Userstyles: style 60170 style 39303
